thread_queues¶

class thread_queues.E1(queue)¶

Producer 1 which searches for prime numbers and puts the in the queue

__init__(queue)¶
Parameters:queue – Producer and Consumer “communicate” via the queue, Producer puts data in the queue and the Consumer fetches data from it
__module__ = 'thread_queues'¶
run()¶

Checks for prime number and puts them into the queue

Returns:void
class thread_queues.E2(queue)¶

Producer 2 which gets input data from the user and either puts input into the queue or exits the programm

__init__(queue)¶
Parameters:queue – Seperate Queue, which also is there for communication between Producer and Consumer
__module__ = 'thread_queues'¶
run()¶

Gets User Input and either exits the Programm or puts the input into the queue

Returns:void
class thread_queues.V1(queue)¶

Consumer 1 which gets data from the queue and then puts it out to the console and writes it into a file

__init__(queue)¶
Parameters:queue – Producer puts data into the queue, and Consumer fetches data from it
__module__ = 'thread_queues'¶
run()¶

Get data from queue, put it out to the console and write it into the file

Returns:void
class thread_queues.V2(queue)¶

Consumer 2 which gets data from the Queue and checks if it was a prime number

__init__(queue)¶
Parameters:queue – Fetch data from the queue
__module__ = 'thread_queues'¶
run()¶

Fetch data from queue and check if it is a prime number

Returns:void
thread_queues.ist_primzahl(number)¶
Parameters:number – The number to be checked if it is prime
Returns:True or False depending if the argument given is a prime number
